knimeNode.name: To Knime Network
knimeNode.shortDescription: Converts a FoodChain-Lab network to the KNIME Network mining format.

fullDescription.intro: Converts a FoodChain-Lab network to the KNIME Network Mining format. This allows you to analyze the network with Network Mining node https://tech.knime.org/network-mining.

tab.name: Options

option.name: Add Prefix to Node and Edge IDs

tab.option: If checked, a prefix is added to each node id and each edge id. This is needed, if a node id is equal to an edge id.

ports.inPort: Table with Station data. Is provided by first out port of Supply Chain Reader.
Table with Delivery data. Is provided by second out port of Supply Chain Reader.
